history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00271
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION CALLING FOR THE ESTABLISHMENT OF A DRUG REHABILITATION CENTER IN EVERY HIGHLY URBANIZED CITY IN THE COUNTRY
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : CASTELO, WINSTON "WINNIE"
DATE FILED : 2016-08-23
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Referred to Stakeholders on 2016-09-15
          -Referred to the Dangerous Drugs Board and the Department of Health for comments and suggestions
      2. Under deliberation by the Mother Committee on 2016-09-22
          -Initial Deliberation on Measures calling for the establishment of Rehabilitation Centers
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON DANGEROUS DRUGS ON 2016-08-30
